amendment.description: Amendment adds an "allowable use" within the grant program established under the bill to develop, implement, or expand the use of programs that utilize secure containers for prescription drugs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 114-551 to add an "allowable use" within the grant program established under the bill to develop, implement, or expand the use of programs that utilize secure containers for prescription drugs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (MI) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Bishop (MI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (MI) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
